title: 3 and Out - Packers Davante Trade Malpractice, McDaniels Raiders Rollin, Baker/Browns Drama, Blame Pete Carroll, Von Miller Overpay
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Packers Davante Trade Malpractice, McDaniels Raiders Rollin, Baker/Browns Drama, Blame Pete Carroll, Von Miller Overpay
description:
John reacts to the shocking trade sending Davante Adams to the Raiders to reunite with his Fresno St. QB Derek Carr, and explains why Green Bay should have never never made the deal, why he's been blown away by the new Raiders regime's moves. He also dives into Baker Mayfield's public trade request, why the Browns public comments criticizing his maturity were so shocking, and why Pete Carroll's handling of the Russell Wilson exposed him as the problem in Seattle, and why the Bills may have massively overpaid for Von Miller.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
